tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların seni nasıl hatırlamasını istediğini düşün ve ona göre yaşa.
tr_quotes.author: Barb Rogers

tr_quotes.quote: En küçük hareket en büyük niyetten daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: John Burroughs

tr_quotes.quote: Konuşmaya niyetlendiğinde her zaman kendine sor, doğru mu, gerekli mi, nazik mi
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: En küçük iyilik hareketi, en büyük niyetten daha değerlidir.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kişinin gerçek ölçüsü, ona hiçbir şekilde iyiliği dokunmayan birine nasıl davrandığındadır.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Acı çekmemize sebep, başımıza gelen değildir; başımıza gelenle ilgili kendimize ne söylediğimizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Pema Chodron

tr_quotes.quote: Aza kanaat edersen, dünyada senden zengin kimse olamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Sağlığı olanın umudu, umudu olanın her şeyi vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Sizi incinebilir kılan her şey sizi güzelleştirir.
tr_quotes.author: Brené Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybettiğinizde, aldığınız dersi de kaybetmeyin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En kötü düşmanınız bile, kendi ihtiyatsız düşünceleriniz kadar size zarar veremez.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Problemlerimizi onları yaratırken kullandığımız aynı düşünce yapısı ile çözemeyiz
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Hareketlerimiz, kelimelerimiz ve düşüncelerimiz aracılığıyla seçim sahibi olduğumuzu asla unutmamalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Sogyal Rinpoche

tr_quotes.quote: Harcamaktan zevk aldığınız zaman, harcanmış değildir.
tr_quotes.author: John Lennon

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyayı geliştirecek yer, ilk olarak bir kişinin kalbinde, kafasında ve ellerindedir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeye tümüyle sahip olmayabiliriz ama birlikte her şeye sahibiz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Öfkeniz için cezalandırılmazsınız, öfkeniz tarafından cezalandırılırsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Konuşmaya niyetlendiğinde her zaman kendine sor: doğru mu, gerekli mi, nazik mi?
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın pişmanlıkları hayallerinin yerini almadığı sürece, o insan yaşlı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: İçinde bulunduğumuz durum ne düşündüğümüzün sonucudur. Akıl her şeydir. Düşündüğümüz şey olacağımız şeydir.
tr_quotes.author: Buddha

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinize acıdan bir kimlik inşa ettiğiniz zaman, artık ondan kurtulamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

tr_quotes.quote: Gördüklerimiz aslında aradıklarımızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Aklın huzuru hayatta sorun yaşamamak değil, onunla başa çıkabilme yeteneğidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan büyüklüğü, servet ve güçte değil, karakter ve iyilikte yatmaktadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anne Frank

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan düşüncelerinde ve yaptıklarında ciddiyse, o gerçek bir azizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan görecektir ki eşyaya ve başka insanlara karşı düşüncelerini değiştirdikçe, eşyalar ve başka insanlar da kendisine karşı hallerini değiştirirler.
tr_quotes.author: James Ailen

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamımızda önemli değişiklik yapmak istiyorsak, tutum ve davranışlarımızda çok önemli değişiklikler yapmalıyız. Ancak çok önemli değişiklik yapmak istiyorsak, o zaman temel düşüncelerimiz ve algılarımız üzerinde çalışmalıyız.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

tr_quotes.quote: Olaylar karşısında gösterdiğimiz tutumlar, olayların kendisinden daha önemlidir.
tr_quotes.author: W. Tozer

tr_quotes.quote: Tutumlarınızı değiştirmek istiyorsanız, işe davranışlarınızda bir değişiklik yaparak başlayın, başka bir deyişle, olabileceğiniz kişinin, olmayı tercih ettiğiniz kişinin rolünü oynayın, zamanla eski korkunç insanın, yok olduğunu göreceksiniz.
tr_quotes.author: William Glasser

tr_quotes.quote: Benim kuşağımın en büyük keşfi, bir insanın tavrını değiştirmekle yaşamını da değiştirebileceğini öğrenmesidir.
tr_quotes.author: William James

tr_quotes.quote: Yüksekliğinizi, yeteneğiniz değil, tutumunuz belirleyecektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Herhangi bir neslin en büyük keşfi, bir insanın tutumunu değiştirerek hayatını değiştirebileceğidir.
tr_quotes.author: William James

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyi her zaman yumuşak saplarından alın.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz çukurun içindeyiz, ama bazılarımız yıldızlara bakıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmiş yerleşti, şimdiki zaman senden kaçıyor, geleceği düşün.
tr_quotes.author: Duc de Levis

tr_quotes.quote: Davranışlardaki zayıflık karakter zayıflığına dönüşür.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar genellikle karar verdikleri kadar mutludurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

tr_quotes.quote: Her aşırı tutum, benlikten bir kaçıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat, başına gelenlerin yüzde 10'u ve ona nasıl tepki verdiğin yüzde 90'ıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu herhangi bir şey, olumsuz hiçbir şeyden daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Yetenek, yapabileceğiniz şeydir. Motivasyon, ne yaptığınızı belirler. Davranış onu ne kadar iyi yaptığınla belirlenir.
tr_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

tr_quotes.quote: İlahi olana giden birçok yol vardır. Ben şarkı, dans ve kahkaha yollarını seçtim.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm tanrılar, tüm gökler, tüm cehennemler içinizdedir.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

tr_quotes.quote: Kendinizi şımartın, için, günlük hayatı düşünün ve gerisini şansa bırakın.
tr_quotes.author: Euripides

tr_quotes.quote: En iyinin çoğunu ve en azını en kötüsünü yapın.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekle nasıl karşılaşılacağı bir seçimdir.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

tr_quotes.quote: Barış içeriden gelir. Onsuz aramayın.
tr_quotes.author: Budha

tr_quotes.quote: Günümüzde insanlar hata bulmak için doğuyor. Aşil'e baktıklarında sadece topuğunu görüyorlar.
tr_quotes.author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluk dışarıdan gelmez, içeriden gelir.
tr_quotes.author: Helen Keller

tr_quotes.quote: Olumlu herhangi bir şey, olumsuz hiçbir şeyden daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: You can pull off anything if you have the right attitude. Being cool is whatever you think it is. Own your style
en_quotes.author: Freja Beha Erichsen

en_quotes.quote: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality
en_quotes.author: Shawn Ashmore

en_quotes.quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new
en_quotes.author: Og Mandino

en_quotes.quote: Creativity is not talent but attitude
en_quotes.author: Jenova Chen

en_quotes.quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference
en_quotes.author: Winston Churchill

en_quotes.quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: Always have an attitude of gratitude
en_quotes.author: Sterling K. Brown

en_quotes.quote: I believe I have the attitude of a champion and a winner, and I'm not apologetic for it
en_quotes.author: Jon Jones

en_quotes.quote: The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day
en_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

en_quotes.quote: Watch out for the joy-stealers: gossip, criticism, complaining, faultfinding, and a negative, judgmental attitude
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet
en_quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

en_quotes.quote: Being sexy is all about attitude, not body type. It's a state of mind
en_quotes.author: Amisha Patel

en_quotes.quote: When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic
en_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

en_quotes.quote: Anything can happen, so you have to control your attitude and stay strong
en_quotes.author: Jason Day

en_quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitudes
en_quotes.author: William James

en_quotes.quote: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?
en_quotes.author: Paul Walker

en_quotes.quote: I think it's my adventure, my trip, my journey, and I guess my attitude is, let the chips fall where they may
en_quotes.author: Leonard Nimoy

en_quotes.quote: Attitude determines the altitude of life
en_quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

en_quotes.quote: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude
en_quotes.author: Ralph Marston

en_quotes.quote: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude
en_quotes.author: Pat Riley

en_quotes.quote: Never walk into a hospital crying. Have an attitude that you will make someone else's life better
en_quotes.author: Jim Kelly

en_quotes.quote: The purely agitational attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: Eagles come in all shapes and sizes, but you will recognize them chiefly by their attitudes
en_quotes.author: E. F. Schumacher

en_quotes.quote: The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them
en_quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

en_quotes.quote: The higher the better. It's more about an attitude. High heels empower women in a way
en_quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is, a monument, a statue, ought to signify unity instead of division
en_quotes.author: Bill Nelson

en_quotes.quote: Mental attitude and concentration are the keys to pitching
en_quotes.author: Ferguson Jenkins

en_quotes.quote: No matter what the recipe, any baker can do wonders in the kitchen with some good ingredients and an upbeat attitude!
en_quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

en_quotes.quote: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Wearing the correct dress for any occasion is a matter of good manners
en_quotes.author: Loretta Young

en_quotes.quote: I walk tall; I got a tall attitude
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Attitude is everything
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: I have an attitude. It's what I do. I'm edgy. I have an attitude
en_quotes.author: Hope Solo

en_quotes.quote: What is pride? A rocket that emulates the stars
en_quotes.author: William Wordsworth

en_quotes.quote: You need an attitude of service. You're not just serving yourself. You help others to grow up and you grow with them
en_quotes.author: David Green

en_quotes.quote: Reject your sense of injury and the injury itself disappears
en_quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

en_quotes.quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight
en_quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

en_quotes.quote: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised
en_quotes.author: Brit Hume

en_quotes.quote: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: I am just as comfortable in sweats and sneakers as I am in a dress and heels. Attitude is everything!
en_quotes.author: Blac Chyna

en_quotes.quote: All punk is is attitude. That's what makes it. The attitude
en_quotes.author: Joey Ramone

en_quotes.quote: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind
en_quotes.author: Marjory Stoneman Douglas

en_quotes.quote: Being black is not a matter of pigmentation - being black is a reflection of a mental attitude
en_quotes.author: Steven Biko

en_quotes.quote: We awaken in others the same attitude of mind we hold toward them
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: The reactionary is always willing to take a progressive attitude on any issue that is dead
en_quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Solidarity is an attitude of resistance, I suppose, or it should be
en_quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

en_quotes.quote: Muslims have a very bad attitude to homosexuality, they're very intolerant
en_quotes.author: Pim Fortuyn

en_quotes.quote: Literature is dangerous: it awakens a rebellious attitude in us
en_quotes.author: Mario Vargas Llosa

en_quotes.quote: It's not true that clothes look better on skinny girls; what counts is the attitude
en_quotes.author: Sonia Rykiel

en_quotes.quote: People in tough times - it doesn't mean they don't have a great attitude
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: When you pray for anyone you tend to modify your personal attitude toward him
en_quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

en_quotes.quote: I've been fired five times for having a bad attitude
en_quotes.author: Meg Rosoff

en_quotes.quote: Character is the result of two things: mental attitude and the way we spend our time
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Attitude is your acceptance of the natural laws, or your rejection of the natural laws
en_quotes.author: Stuart Chase

en_quotes.quote: Out here in California, in the Pacific Ocean, the sharks have a bad attitude
en_quotes.author: Katy Mixon

en_quotes.quote: We don't do lots of jamming on stage, but I think we have the attitude of exploring things and trying something new
en_quotes.author: Anderson East

en_quotes.quote: When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude
en_quotes.author: Richard Pryor

en_quotes.quote: A period of detention in a chilly upstate facility can be a great attitude adjuster
en_quotes.author: Judy Sheindlin

en_quotes.quote: The accounting of the sacrifice is, more than anything else, the attitude toward war memorials in our time
en_quotes.author: Friedrich St. Florian

en_quotes.quote: When you view your world with an attitude of gratitude, you are training yourself to focus on the good in life
en_quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

en_quotes.quote: If you're looking for can-do, earthy-crunchy attitude then you've got to go to Wisconsin
en_quotes.author: Dar Williams

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I'm having a bad day and have an attitude, I stay home. I keep it at home
en_quotes.author: Michael Clarke Duncan

en_quotes.quote: For me, bomber jackets are smart, but they are also street and have a lot of attitude
en_quotes.author: The Weeknd

en_quotes.quote: Your attitude is contagious
en_quotes.author: Kevin Plank

en_quotes.quote: With my talent, I can make people laugh and give them another attitude about life. What a blessing that is for me
en_quotes.author: Doris Roberts

en_quotes.quote: Even as a little child, I've always had that comedian kind of attitude
en_quotes.author: Etta James

en_quotes.quote: I think whether you're having setbacks or not, the role of a leader is to always display a winning attitude
en_quotes.author: Colin Powell

en_quotes.quote: I thought one should have the attitude of 'What do you care what other people think!'
en_quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

en_quotes.quote: I don't think punk ever really dies, because punk rock attitude can never die
en_quotes.author: Billy Idol

en_quotes.quote: In every country I've gone to, if you smile at people, they are going to be happy. This is my attitude
en_quotes.author: Son Heung-min

en_quotes.quote: You cannot tailor-make the situations in life but you can tailor-make the attitudes to fit those situations
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes
en_quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

en_quotes.quote: If you have fun and keep a good attitude, people want to work with you
en_quotes.author: James Marsden

en_quotes.quote: I like my hair long, and I love my bangs. I love them because I can pin them back or keep the fringe with attitude
en_quotes.author: Cassie Steele

en_quotes.quote: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to have an attitude if you're famous
en_quotes.author: Adriana Lima

en_quotes.quote: At home in Ireland, there's a habit of avoidance, an ironical attitude towards the authority figure
en_quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

en_quotes.quote: There is definitely something sexy about a girl with an attitude and a pair of leather pants
en_quotes.author: Eliza Dushku

en_quotes.quote: If a person can be said to have the wrong attitude, there is no need to pay attention to his arguments
en_quotes.author: John McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: Individuals need to be willing to face truth about their attitudes, behaviors, even what we want out of life
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us
en_quotes.author: John N. Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: It is important to have the attitude and self confidence to be Barca's goalkeeper, and that I've got
en_quotes.author: Marc-Andre ter Stegen

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is always one of sensuality, aggressive enthusiasm and a kind of outrageousness in my expression
en_quotes.author: Sally Kirkland

en_quotes.quote: If a person gets his attitude toward money straight, it will help straighten out almost every other area in his life
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: When you are thwarted, it is your own attitude that is out of order
en_quotes.author: Meister Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: Stop this attitude that older people ain't any good anymore! We're as good as we ever were - if we ever were any good
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face
en_quotes.author: Simon Cowell

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is, do as much as I can while I'm free. And if I'm arrested I'll still do as much as I can
en_quotes.author: Aung San Suu Kyi

en_quotes.quote: My attitude with covers is, make it your own or else leave it alone
en_quotes.author: Glenn Danzig

en_quotes.quote: Refuse to be a lazy Christian, and resist a passive, apathetic attitude
en_quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

en_quotes.quote: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes
en_quotes.author: William J. Brennan, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I had to create some good work habits and attitude
en_quotes.author: S. Truett Cathy

en_quotes.quote: Non-violence is a permanent attitude we bring to the breakfast table and bring to bed at night
en_quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

en_quotes.quote: Everybody seems to be wasting their time online. There is such a narcissistic attitude. It's such a strange world
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Maniscalco

en_quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that man can alter his life simply by altering his attitude of mind
en_quotes.author: James Truslow Adams

en_quotes.quote: It was a whole new attitude: no makeup, less is more... the '90s were fun!
en_quotes.author: Edward Enninful

en_quotes.quote: You can't beat the beehive for glam punkette attitude
en_quotes.author: Rob Sheffield

en_quotes.quote: Being a sex symbol has to do with an attitude, not looks. Most men think it's looks, most women know otherwise
en_quotes.author: Kathleen Turner

en_quotes.quote: The place of chess in the society is closely related to the attitude of young people towards our game
en_quotes.author: Boris Spassky

en_quotes.quote: There's a certain attitude to Los Angeles
en_quotes.author: Inara George

en_quotes.quote: The Olympic Games are a national cause, and a national cause calls for a nationwide attitude
en_quotes.author: Gianna Angelopoulos-Daskalaki

en_quotes.quote: If you want my personal attitude, I would tell you that I don't care about a person's sexual orientation
en_quotes.author: Vladimir Putin

en_quotes.quote: The only reason to have a positive mental attitude is that it makes life better. It doesn't cure cancer
en_quotes.author: Molly Ivins

en_quotes.quote: Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to watch 'Gossip Girl' to have an attitude
en_quotes.author: Prince

en_quotes.quote: Dada was an extreme protest against the physical side of painting. It was a metaphysical attitude
en_quotes.author: Marcel Duchamp

en_quotes.quote: You need to have a can-do attitude. There is always a way
en_quotes.author: Alan Mulally

en_quotes.quote: I think I have a mental nappy attitude
en_quotes.author: Paul Mooney

en_quotes.quote: You know what's funny to me? Attitude
en_quotes.author: Don Rickles

en_quotes.quote: I don't think it's a good attitude in your life to feel that you have to be rich to have self-esteem
en_quotes.author: Tom Petty

en_quotes.quote: Attitudes are more important than facts
en_quotes.author: George MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: Only one thing can conquer war - that attitude of mind which can see nothing in war but destruction and annihilation
en_quotes.author: Ludwig von Mises

en_quotes.quote: Punk was defined by an attitude rather than a musical style
en_quotes.author: David Byrne

en_quotes.quote: I have a very childish attitude to books - a very non-analytic enthusiasm... like Alice falling down the chute
en_quotes.author: Mariella Frostrup

en_quotes.quote: Cardi actually says stuff. Nicki just has attitude. So what. Big deal
en_quotes.author: Danielle Bregoli

en_quotes.quote: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel
en_quotes.author: Lou Ferrigno

en_quotes.quote: Hollywood's a very weird place. I think there's less of everything except for attitude
en_quotes.author: Dean Cain

en_quotes.quote: The music is first and foremost everything - no egos, no attitude, nothing - it's about the music
en_quotes.author: Big Boi

en_quotes.quote: Bad attitudes will ruin your team
en_quotes.author: Terry Bradshaw

en_quotes.quote: I was bringing my attitude as a regular person 'cause this is my attitude
en_quotes.author: Glenn Danzig

en_quotes.quote: The biggest challenge is how to affect public attitudes and make people care
en_quotes.author: Jim Fowler

en_quotes.quote: The Attitude Era was something special
en_quotes.author: Mark Henry

en_quotes.quote: I don't mean this in a stuck-up way, but I needed an attitude song
en_quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

en_quotes.quote: The political parties who prefer lockdowns should end their politics that is based on negative attitude
en_quotes.author: Shehbaz Sharif

en_quotes.quote: The purely agitation attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject
en_quotes.author: Michael Korda

en_quotes.quote: We need the right attitude and the right motivation - that can decide the match above everything else
en_quotes.author: Sergio Ramos

en_quotes.quote: For myself and my attitude, I have, every day, to work on it
en_quotes.author: Simona Halep

en_quotes.quote: I look at Jagger and the like and if I see a good attitude I'll admire it but I wouldn't copy their style
en_quotes.author: Michael Hutchence

en_quotes.quote: No rational argument will have a rational effect on a man who does not want to adopt a rational attitude
en_quotes.author: Karl Popper

en_quotes.quote: Athletic competition clearly defines the unique power of our attitude
en_quotes.author: Bart Starr

en_quotes.quote: What sculptors do is represent the essence of gesture. What is important in mime is attitude
en_quotes.author: Marcel Marceau

en_quotes.quote: It's better for me to play with guys because Rock 'n' Roll has such an aggressive attitude
en_quotes.author: Lita Ford

en_quotes.quote: We're humans. Why always turn human attitude into political behaviours? I hate that
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Betancourt

en_quotes.quote: How can any person with a myopic view and harbouring intense parochial attitude even think of leading the nation?
en_quotes.author: Sharad Pawar

en_quotes.quote: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people
en_quotes.author: Bessie Head

en_quotes.quote: I love the body language of the women cricketers and the attitude with which they carry themselves
en_quotes.author: Aishwarya Rajesh

en_quotes.quote: My parents have a strong work ethic, but their attitude to life, their philosophy, is: 'whatever makes you happy.'
en_quotes.author: Sally Hawkins

en_quotes.quote: I really believe you can predict when someone has a great attitude, a real well of talent
en_quotes.author: Taylor Hackford

en_quotes.quote: It's not too good to have this attitude in F1. It could be a disadvantage
en_quotes.author: Alain Prost

en_quotes.quote: Elvis Costello had a brand new bag. He was a musician, but he knew all about the attitude part of it
en_quotes.author: Nick Lowe

en_quotes.quote: I have always detested any departure from reality, an attitude which I relate to my mother's poor mental health
en_quotes.author: Jean Piaget

en_quotes.quote: You've got to have the same attitude each day. You've got to show up to work
en_quotes.author: Baker Mayfield

en_quotes.quote: I love women with attitude
en_quotes.author: Kevin Hart

en_quotes.quote: I feel very comfortable with the U.K. tone and humour and laid-back attitude
en_quotes.author: Shawn Mendes

en_quotes.quote: What was past was past. I suppose that was the general attitude
en_quotes.author: V. S. Naipaul

en_quotes.quote: I like grown-up comedy, where it's about character and attitude and life as opposed to obvious gross-out and jokes
en_quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

en_quotes.quote: It got very tedious saying the same jokes in the same way with the same attitude
en_quotes.author: Norm MacDonald

en_quotes.quote: You do manage a somewhat religious attitude toward your art. It is a calling rather than a job
en_quotes.author: Jim Harrison

en_quotes.quote: Today's youth are told to get rich or die trying and they really shouldn't take that attitude forward with them
en_quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

en_quotes.quote: Funny is an attitude
en_quotes.author: Flip Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Being a part of SKECHERS is exciting. It is such a hip company with a great attitude and image
en_quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

en_quotes.quote: But I think bands that rolled in with a big attitude, like they were some big deal, I just found that very strange
en_quotes.author: Rob Zombie

en_quotes.quote: In America, our differences matter, but our country matters more. That's the attitude I wanted to take to the Senate
en_quotes.author: Cory Booker

en_quotes.quote: Yes, we're still five little people with a noisy attitude
en_quotes.author: Angus Young

en_quotes.quote: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude
en_quotes.author: Don Rickles

en_quotes.quote: Iraq is just a symbol of the attitude of western democracies to the rest of the world
en_quotes.author: Harold Pinter

en_quotes.quote: I still have a young attitude
en_quotes.author: Pat Morita

en_quotes.quote: You lose attitude when you feel too comfortable, so I prefer to wear clothes that have a certain edge to them
en_quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

en_quotes.quote: I don't know, I've always written songs that are mainly about attitude, not me personally
en_quotes.author: Lemmy

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is different. And no one understands me the way my friends do
en_quotes.author: Hima Das

en_quotes.quote: I don't think it's a healthy thing in your personal life to go around with that never-sure attitude
en_quotes.author: Matt Lauer

en_quotes.quote: France has been very good for me. It has given me a very worldly-cool attitude
en_quotes.author: Marianne Faithfull

en_quotes.quote: I was always the guy getting kicked out of my classes at school for having an attitude problem
en_quotes.author: Chevy Chase

en_quotes.quote: It's not the style that motivates me, as much as an attitude of openness that I have when I go into a project
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: Our players have a fantastic attitude, and people are going to see a Madrid side with a lot of talent
en_quotes.author: Julen Lopetegui

en_quotes.quote: You can't be a crazy rebel in the face of death, it's not a fitting attitude
en_quotes.author: Michel Houellebecq

en_quotes.quote: Bob Altman had this relaxed but serious attitude. Everybody loved him. I wanted him to adopt me
en_quotes.author: Steve Buscemi

en_quotes.quote: I think that major championships are as much about attitude as they are anything else
en_quotes.author: Tom Lehman

en_quotes.quote: We've created a tenfold core value protocol to make sure that we don't fall into an 'empire' attitude
en_quotes.author: Joel Salatin

en_quotes.quote: I'm taking a bit of a wait-and-see attitude towards 3D
en_quotes.author: Christopher Nolan

en_quotes.quote: When I was younger, I was trying to create from attitude more than anything else
en_quotes.author: Robert Trujillo

en_quotes.quote: Rock n' roll is not just a fashion statement; it is the attitude, and it has a political posturing as well
en_quotes.author: CeeLo Green

en_quotes.quote: The single biggest surprise about arriving to the Senate is the defeatist attitude here
en_quotes.author: Ted Cruz

en_quotes.quote: I guess I've kind of had an attitude my whole life
en_quotes.author: Christina Applegate

en_quotes.quote: I've never had any prima donna attitude against me. It's always been very respectful
en_quotes.author: Rey Mysterio

en_quotes.quote: Even when I'm playing someone named 'Fat Amy.' I'm all about confidence and attitude
en_quotes.author: Rebel Wilson

en_quotes.quote: My attitude toward men who mess around is simple: If you find 'em, kill 'em
en_quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

en_quotes.quote: We're making high-budget movies with a low-budget attitude
en_quotes.author: Dean Devlin

en_quotes.quote: You can measure a programmer's perspective by noting his attitude on the continuing vitality of FORTRAN
en_quotes.author: Alan Perlis

en_quotes.quote: My attitude is that, if you have nothing to hide, why not show it?
en_quotes.author: Bradley Wiggins

en_quotes.quote: I always had this attitude of, 'They don't get to tell me how I live my life.'
en_quotes.author: Rain Dove

en_quotes.quote: Just because you're a luxury brand doesn't mean you have to have an attitude
en_quotes.author: Angela Ahrendts

en_quotes.quote: I'm not anti-fashion, but I've always had a bit of a punk attitude. That's important, I think. I do my own thing
en_quotes.author: Sade Adu

en_quotes.quote: Our attitude is that we want to cross over. You can't go on making records just for your own hometown
en_quotes.author: Cheryl James

en_quotes.quote: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor
en_quotes.author: Teri Garr

en_quotes.quote: I try to cross as many genres as possible with the same attitude. I want every song to be very clear
en_quotes.author: Coy Bowles

en_quotes.quote: I always had the attitude that I wanted to throw a no-hitter every game
en_quotes.author: Dennis Eckersley

en_quotes.quote: The American attitude towards efficiency and execution should always underlie architecture
en_quotes.author: Helmut Jahn

en_quotes.quote: People have often asked if I'm gay because I don't go out of my way to spit and scratch and give people attitude
en_quotes.author: Jason Bateman

en_quotes.quote: Surfers have the most attitude
en_quotes.author: Shaun White

en_quotes.quote: I think there is a real negative attitude to splitting up with someone in our society, but it is good to stay friends
en_quotes.author: Rachel Riley

en_quotes.quote: Hip-hop is as much an attitude and perspective as it is a music form
en_quotes.author: Cheo Hodari Coker

en_quotes.quote: Any race I go into, I've always got the attitude of throwing myself into and wanting nothing but No. 1
en_quotes.author: Caroline Buchanan

en_quotes.quote: As long as the attitude is to only show the sheet metal, then automobile advertising will continue to be wretched
en_quotes.author: Jerry Della Femina

en_quotes.quote: If you try to come off as this big-time star with an attitude, people don't like that
en_quotes.author: Selena

en_quotes.quote: Psychographics speaks more to an attitude, a lifestyle
en_quotes.author: Richard Hayne

en_quotes.quote: That attitude and toughness that we want to play with, that, to me, is the most critical thing
en_quotes.author: Dan Quinn

en_quotes.quote: Adrian Clayborn is somebody that relentlessly brings that attitude, energy, and toughness
en_quotes.author: Dan Quinn

en_quotes.quote: The attitude and identity that we want to play with doesn't change
en_quotes.author: Dan Quinn

en_quotes.quote: Donald Evans is a favorite person of mine. His worth ethic, his attitude and his dedication really set him apart
en_quotes.author: Joe Greene

en_quotes.quote: You have to come in to major championships, and your attitude has to be on point
en_quotes.author: Jason Day

en_quotes.quote: Before 'Gangnam Style' I was not a good attitude artist
en_quotes.author: Psy

en_quotes.quote: I've set the bar high in terms of having a very feminist attitude towards how I present my body
en_quotes.author: Bel Powley

en_quotes.quote: That used to be what I grew up on - which is the Attitude Era, because you never knew what was going to happen next
en_quotes.author: Enzo Amore

en_quotes.quote: An American orchestra doesn't want to play more than it has to. I respectfully disagree with that attitude
en_quotes.author: Zubin Mehta

en_quotes.quote: The attitude of 'every nation unto itself' is a destructive one for the future of Israel
en_quotes.author: Tzipi Livni

en_quotes.quote: I really have been lucky because I've always had a very healthy attitude to my body
en_quotes.author: Lily James

en_quotes.quote: The pool is terrible, but that doesn't have much to do with my record swims. That's all mental attitude
en_quotes.author: Mark Spitz

en_quotes.quote: As a player, if your attitude is questioned, it's horrible
en_quotes.author: Jack Wilshere

en_quotes.quote: My character in 'OK OK' has a lot of attitude, and it is an interesting one
en_quotes.author: Hansika Motwani

en_quotes.quote: I had an attitude problem when I was a kid. I'm not gonna lie
en_quotes.author: Tionne Watkins

en_quotes.quote: I like to say it's an attitude of not just thinking outside the box, but not even seeing the box
en_quotes.author: Safra A. Catz

en_quotes.quote: I am a Piscean, and they have a lovingly detached attitude towards life
en_quotes.author: Shahid Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: The characteristic political attitude of today is not one of positive belief, but of despair
en_quotes.author: Herbert Read

en_quotes.quote: I had an attitude about some work, like television sitcoms. It was selling your soul
en_quotes.author: Christopher Lloyd

en_quotes.quote: I've always had that attitude that things happen for a reason
en_quotes.author: Ryne Sandberg

en_quotes.quote: With his incredible attitude, with his incredible winning mentality, Cristiano Ronaldo is a unique player
en_quotes.author: Ronaldo

en_quotes.quote: But Jesus changes your attitude towards yourself and towards other people
en_quotes.author: Cliff Richard

en_quotes.quote: Abhorrence of apartheid is a moral attitude, not a policy
en_quotes.author: Edward Heath

en_quotes.quote: What reader wants to be told what attitude to strike?
en_quotes.author: Ian Mcewan

en_quotes.quote: It's nice to be cheered, but I'll always have a good attitude on the pitch
en_quotes.author: Olivier Giroud

en_quotes.quote: Coaches will eventually notice a great attitude, and they respect that
en_quotes.author: Heather O'Reilly

en_quotes.quote: I train with a serious attitude, and when I am having time off, I hope to be respected as well
en_quotes.author: Carlos Tevez

en_quotes.quote: I was impressed by Hendrix. His attitude was brilliant. Even the way he walked was amazing
en_quotes.author: Ritchie Blackmore

en_quotes.quote: My parents are very supportive: they helped redirect my technology attitude and my punkness into positive things
en_quotes.author: Harper Reed

en_quotes.quote: That's the attitude I approach everything with: I don't want there to be a lot of dressing on anything
en_quotes.author: Anderson East

en_quotes.quote: Vince McMahon became a billionaire based on Attitude, and Attitude was spawned by the ECW experience
en_quotes.author: Paul Heyman

en_quotes.quote: I just focus on what I can control, and that's how hard I play and my attitude
en_quotes.author: Jalen Brunson

en_quotes.quote: I think my attitude has always been to put food on the table
en_quotes.author: James Garner

en_quotes.quote: The 'Okay-I'll-give-it-a-try-but-I-don't-think-it-will-work' attitude produces failures
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: I have to have an attitude of gratitude and not miss opportunities
en_quotes.author: Urijah Faber

en_quotes.quote: The Client List' represents everything we want to be - fresh, exciting, and original with attitude
en_quotes.author: Nancy Dubuc

en_quotes.quote: Regardless of what the stakes are, our attitude and our mindset doesn't change
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Brogdon

en_quotes.quote: Pessimism only describes an attitude, and not facts, and hence is entirely subjective
en_quotes.author: Francis Parker Yockey

en_quotes.quote: I am shocked by the easy attitude of many in the media towards disclosing our Nation's secrets
en_quotes.author: Todd Tiahrt

en_quotes.quote: The old attitude toward newspapers was that they were completely disposable - today's newspaper is tomorrow's fish wrap
en_quotes.author: Ray Guy

en_quotes.quote: In aid, the proper attitude is one omitting gratitude
en_quotes.author: Marya Mannes

en_quotes.quote: Every baseball crowd, like every theatre audience, has its own distinctive attitude and atmosphere
en_quotes.author: Bill Veeck
